law.text: Each fiscal year all license, permit, and acreage fees, collected by the Energy and Environment Cabinet and which are related to mining or minerals, shall be deposited to the credit of the mining and minerals trust fund in an amount not to exceed the annual debt service required for a mining and minerals building.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 226, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 260, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1982.
